data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - High Fantasy Resource Bundle
data.detailed_description:
We are proud to present the High Fantasy Resource Bundle, a large composition of fantasy-themed resources for all of your RPG-making needs. This bundle represents countless hundreds of hours of eye-straining, wrist-debilitating labor and love!

Everyone has a story to tell, and it is our goal to help you tell that story. With these resources, you can build countless worlds, create huge casts of characters, and populate your dungeons with horrendous and terrifying beasts.

This pack contains:
  • 70 Battle Backgrounds
  • 96 Front-View Battlers
  • 90 Side-View Battlers (may require a 3rd party script to utilize)
  • Over 200 Character Sprite Sheets!
  • 168 Faces (21 full sets)!
  • 6 Overlays for clouds and rain (may require a 3rd party script to utilize)
  • 35 Tile Sheets (9 auto-tile sheets, 26 B-E sheets)
  • Bonus script for RPG Maker VX Ace!

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
